name: Vegan Tartar Sauce
description: Vegan Tartar Sauce is so easy to make at home, and goes perfectly with Vegan Fish Sticks and other "fishy" foods! Ready in just 5 minutes.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup vegan mayo ((homemade OR store bought))
2 teaspoons dried dill, or 2 tablespoons fresh
2 tablespoon fresh lemon juice (about 1 lemon squeezed)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and stir until combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and stir until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and store in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and store in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.

keywords: dairy free tartar sauce, egg free tartar sauce, vegan tartar sauce
